name: Paradox (Prototype)
description:
Hi there, I created this as a student project last year. It basically takes the Stasis Rune mechanic from Zelda BOTW and applies it to an FPS puzzle game. Heavy inspiration was also drawn from portal. 

It's got a lot of bugs and looks kinda dodgy for the most part, but that's why it's still a prototype. It was more just a means to test a game mechanic I suppose. I hope to work on this game again in the future when I've improved my skills. 

Oh yeah, I also voiced the really crappy tutorial that's present. It's long winded and my accent randomly changes halfway through, but you'll need it to help you with the puzzles.

Controls:

- E: Pick up boxes

- Left Mouse: Fire time beam

- Right Mouse: Fire force beam

- Movement: WASD/Space

- Q: Unfreeze all frozen objects
